help.title: Help
help.section1: Zoom in with a double click or the '+' in the top left corner or search your address using the search bar at the top.
help.section2: With a left click on an existing business (blue circle) you can edit this business.
help.section3: With a right click on any position on the map you can create a new Business.

loginhelp.title: Information
loginhelp.section1: To make changes on the map you have to be logged in with an OpenStreetMap-Login.
loginhelp.section2: But in this view you can already peer, how the website works.

validate.streetOrPlace: The street or the place are required
validate.notStreetAndPlace: The street and the place can't both be filled
validate.subtitle: Fields with * are required (At Fields with (*) is just one at a time required)

popups.buttontitle: You have to be logged in for this function

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.section: If you press Yes all your changes will be lost.

node.title: Already existing business
node.section1: At this position is already a business with exact same name and category
node.section2: You have the possibility though to edit the already existing informations with a left click on the business.

note.title: Already existing changes
note.section1: For this business there already exists a change, which isn't processed yet.
note.section2: You have the possibility though to leave a comment directly in OpenStreetMap:

error.title: Error
error.nominatim: There is a problem with the connection. Check your internet connection or try it again later.

osm.login: User could not be logged in.
osm.load: There is a problem with loading data from OpenStreetMap. Check your internet connection or try it again later.

overpass.surrounding: There is a problem with uploading the data to OpenStreetMap. Check your internet connection or try it again later.
